body:
Requirements
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Use `/bin/sh`. Tested on OSX and Ubuntu.


Installation
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Download to your executable path.

    $ cd $HOME/bin
    $ curl -LO https://raw.github.com/Tomohiro/h/master/h
    $ chmod +x ./h


Usage
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

    $ h rbenv # same: rbenv help
    $ h gem   # same: gem -h
    $ h irssi # same: irssi --help


---

LICENSE
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

See LICENSE for details.

name: H
